title: ARAM Club
body:
Hi!

If you're a casual ARAM player and would like to play with others for a bit of fun and like a good laugh then we could be the peeps you're looking for. I run a few TS rooms which are mostly active (details will be in MOTD) which also bring some laughs to the table. 
Just a few requirements:
-Able to have a good laugh
-Respectful to others (Although much ridiculing/banter is to be had in TS)
-Have a small sense of maturity when it calls for it
-Enjoy ARAM

If you're interested add me and throw me a line on League IGN: Hoaxi

ARAM Shenanigans

replies.body: Club still running ? Would like a add.... account name Rhynal
I play Aram 99.5% and have over 1000 wins. I play hard and enjoy team effort rather than a co op throw match. Add me or send me an invite, I play most champs well.
